name: REC Designers
tagline: Projects to help designers get up and running with REC
body:
### Template Boilerplate - [View](https://github.com/ReallyEasyCart/template-boilerplate)

A quickstart ready for new projects, to help setup a basic folder structure and some other defaults. 

To begin clone down the project like so, replacing "my-project-name" with your project name.

```bash
git clone -o template-boilerplate https://github.com/ReallyEasyCart/template-boilerplate.git my-project-name
```

[Help contribute to this project](https://github.com/ReallyEasyCart/template-boilerplate). 


--------------------------------------


### Responsive Snippets - [View](https://github.com/ReallyEasyCart/responsive-snippets)

A collection of quick snippets you can use on your REC sites. 

[Help contribute to this project](https://github.com/ReallyEasyCart/template-boilerplate).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
